name: DomainTools
tag_list: whois, hosting-history, whois-history, screenshot-history, reverse-ip, dns-lookup, traceroute, domain-monitor
overview:
DomainTools offers the most comprehensive searchable database of domain name registration and hosting data. Combined with our other data sites such as DailyChanges.com, Screenshots.com and ReverseMX.com, users of DomainTools.com can review millions of historical domain name records from basic Whois, and DNS information, to homepage images and email settings.

The Company’s comprehensive snapshots of past and present domain name registration, ownership and usage data, in addition to powerful research and monitoring resources, help customers by unlocking everything there is to know about a domain name. DomainTools is a Top 250 site in the Alexa rankings.

Visit www.DomainTools.com to learn more.

milestones.description: Relaunch of DomainTools.com, introducing new website look and feel in addition to a more flexible membership structure with a la carte options.
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Debuts New Website and Membership Structure

milestones.description: Application Programming Interface Gives Users the Ability to Bring their Ideas to Life via Rapid Access to Deep Data
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Unveils a Powerful and Extensive API Suite

milestones.description: DailyChanges.com now provides data and statistics in a way that is easier for consumers to understand and digest
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Revitalizes DailyChanges.com, Improving End-user Consumability

milestones.description: Users can analyze MX & SPF usage and configuration by region and or network, gaining fresh insight into relationsihps.
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Introduces ReverseMX.com, and MX Record Lookup Tool for Pinpointing Hard-to-Detect Relationships Between Mail Servers and Domains

milestones.description: By launching on the premium domain name Screenshots.com, DomainTools is able to feature this important content in a more functional way for users that are specifically interested in home page archives.
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Unveils Screenshots.com, a Web Archive of Over 250 Million Historical Website Screenshot Images

milestones.description: DomainTools Unveils Screenshots.com, a Web Archive of Over 250 Million Historical Website Screenshot Images
milestones.source_description: By launching on the premium domain name Screenshots.com, DomainTools is able to feature this important content in a more functional way for users that are specifically interested in home page archives.

milestones.description: A number of organizations track the .com domain registrations by simply reading the Verisign daily zone file, a methodology that underestimates the current count. According to DomainTools, their research shows that the .com count is already well past 100
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Estimates Verisign Manages Over 100 Million .com Domains

milestones.description: DomainTools, the Recognized Leader in Domain Name Research and Monitoring, Today Announced that Escrow.com has Successfully Integrated the DomainTools API Suite to Enhance the Customer Experience
milestones.source_description: Escrow.com Partners With DomainTools to Reinforce Transaction Security and Elevate Customer Experience

milestones.description: DomainTools’ APIs Allow for Flexible Usage with Developer API Access to Whois and Domain Profile Offered at No Cost
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Announces Free APIs for Whois, Domain Profile, and Screenshot Data

milestones.description: The most recent culmination of DomainTools’ mobile strategy is the extension to the Android platform with a new app that provides Whois Lookups on domain names together with website screenshots, key registration dates and valuable domain profile stats.
milestones.source_description: DomainTools Drives Increased Mobile Engagement with New Designs and Apps
